title: Mexico : age distribution of internet users 2019
summary: This statistic displays the proportion of users 2019 who read comics outside of school in the Mexico in 2019 , group .
In 2019 , 8 % of respondents over the 2019 of 75 reported Mexico age distribution internet users .
gold: This statistic gives information on the age distribution of internet users in Mexico as of April 2019.
During this period of time , it was found that 22 percent of internet users in the Latin American country were aged between 25 and 34 years .
